Record Validation Test Step global INSERT_OR_UPDATE global customer sys_atf_step_config_5faa84fa4fda76002d1d958f0310c749 <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_atf_step_config"><sys_atf_step_config action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><batch_order_constraint/><category display_value="Server">317c4dc20b202200a8d7a12cf6673aa8</category><class_name/><class_type>script</class_type><description_generator><![CDATA[function generateDescription() { // the global variable 'step' represents the current glide record var description = gs.getMessage("Returns the executing workflow step name and state for table '{0}'", step.inputs.u_table); return description; } generateDescription(); ]]></description_generator><html_description><![CDATA[<p>Retrieves the name of the current workflow step.</p> <p>Outputs the workflow step name and state for verification</p>]]></html_description><icon>icon-article-document</icon><inputs/><name>Custom getWorkflowStep</name><order>100</order><outputs/><step_env display_value="Server - Independent">6c2bcea1870312009dccc9ded0e3ecca</step_env><step_execution_generator><![CDATA[(function executeStep(inputs, outputs, stepResult) { // check table is available if (gs.nil(inputs.u_table)) { stepResult.setOutputMessage(gs.getMessage("The '{0}' input variable was not specified", inputs.u_table)); stepResult.setFailed(); return; } // check record_id is available if (gs.nil(inputs.u_record_id)) { stepResult.setOutputMessage(gs.getMessage("The '{0}' input variable was not specified", inputs.u_record_id)); stepResult.setFailed(); return; } // use the OC1 sys_id to read the workflow context table // then use the context table sys_id to read the workflow executing table (via the context field) // this gives us access to the current workflow step name and state (status) if (inputs.u_table && inputs.u_record_id) { var tb = new GlideRecord('wf_context'); tb.addQuery('table', inputs.u_table); tb.addQuery('id', inputs.u_record_id); tb.setLimit(1); tb.query(); tb.next(); var ctxt = new GlideRecord('wf_executing'); ctxt.addQuery('context', tb.sys_id); ctxt.setLimit(1); ctxt.query(); ctxt.next(); // set output variables and mark Success stepResult.setSuccess(); outputs.u_workflow_step = ctxt.activity.getDisplayValue(); outputs.u_workflow_step_state = ctxt.state; stepResult.setOutputMessage(gs.getMessage("Current workflow step is: {0} \n workflow state is: {1}", [outputs.u_workflow_step, outputs.u_workflow_step_state])); } }(inputs, outputs, stepResult));]]></step_execution_generator><sys_class_name>sys_atf_step_config</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-04-26 16:13:54</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>5faa84fa4fda76002d1d958f0310c749</sys_id><sys_mod_count>28</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Custom getWorkflowStep</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_atf_step_config_5faa84fa4fda76002d1d958f0310c749</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-04-27 12:19:15</sys_updated_on><template_reminder>Custom Scripted getWorkflowStep retrieves the name and state of the current workflow step</template_reminder><type display_value="Test Step" name="sys_atf_step">8251a4f54f2032002d1d958f0310c777</type></sys_atf_step_config><sys_variable_value action="delete_multiple" query="document_key=5faa84fa4fda76002d1d958f0310c749"/></record_update> 5a9b31094fefb6002d1d958f0310c78b false admin 2017-06-22 17:16:24 669bb5c94fefb6002d1d958f0310c7ad 0 admin 2017-06-22 17:16:24 Custom getWorkflowStepTest Step Configglobal INSERT_OR_UPDATE global customer sys_atf_step_f94d5aa24f1a76002d1d958f0310c736 trueOpen a new 'Oc1 Table' formOpen a New Form205317cd10b10220050192f15d6673af8sys_atf_stepadmin2017-04-26 08:15:56truef94d5aa24f1a76002d1d958f0310c7360Open a New Formglobalfalseglobalsys_atf_step_f94d5aa24f1a76002d1d958f0310c736admin2017-04-26 08:15:56
